body:
Hay,

Last Monday I finally passed the "one year as mod" mark, sadly I never came around to make an AMA.
Vo and Badger also passed the mark...

Some info about me:
- I'm from Germany
- 16 years old
- I hate school xD

Ask away!

(I'll also answer all the silly questions :D)

replies.body: To be honest, you are not my favorite person and you cause unneeded trouble. But you have good sides like organizing scrims and stuff. Just a little advice, don't continue to break the rules...
replies.body_tagged: To be honest, you are not my favorite person and you cause unneeded trouble. But you have good sides like organizing scrims and stuff. Just a little advice, don't continue to break the rules...

replies.body:
Opinions?
You are a cool guy! I like that you are active on slack and always try to bring yourself in. Sadly I don't interact with you that often ..

How do you practice your english?
Mainly through avicus and school. Actually the reason why I know that much English today is avicus. It introduced me to the "English web". Before I only visited website that were in German, now I only use site that are in English.

replies.body:
Is Germany a nice place???
Oh my gawd, yes it is. You can drive for 3 hours and you are at the coast or you can go skiing in the alps :D

Why did you get yourself web tempbanned :(
Funny story xD It was around 1am and I decided that it would be funny/cool to try to pass the application state again. So I wrote the application like I'm a player that wants to be a moderator, sadly the seniors didn't liked that and webbanned me for 2 weeks.

Who is your best buddy?
I can't really choose who is my best buddy xD But I would say Cyanide, we are still in contact and do the silliest stuff on TS :D

How do you think the world will end?
This is a pretty good question! I never really thought about that, but I guess it will be connected to an accident with nuclear weapons or the overpopulation of the earth.

Opinions on me?
Most active forum member? I like that! As far as I know you are still in Calcal (:D), the first avicus team I joined. Besides that you are funny and someone you could talk to for hours. Keep it going! 

Edit: That moment when you don't click the reply button xD

replies.body:
What is your favorite food?
I have to say cookies and pizza xD I eat around 20 cookies each day lol and I also have a freezer in my room only dedicated to pizza :D

Do you have any pets, if yes can i see a picture and what are their names <3
Yus a cat (she's older than me) and the name is Hexe (witch in english). If I find a picture, I'll update this post.

(i fucking love animals ok.. maybe thats why I love Zero :P)
What kind of animal is he? I bet he's a stallion :D

What is your dream job?
Some time ago I aimed for architecture, then civil engineering. Now I have no idea, probably something involving computers or IT...

Do you enjoy being mod :D?
Of course otherwise I would have decided to retire. Sadly it's not as fun as it used to be, but it's always nize to help people on Ts, the server and the forums. And the moderator team is funny as hell :D

replies.body:
FLO <3 Hey man, how you holding up mate? Can't believe you've reached this milestone (if I were still staff I would've reached it during March ^.^). Not sure if it's holidays for you now, but anyway I hope you have a good weekend if not. 

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. Do you sing whilst taking a shower/bath?
  3. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
  4. Do you trust anyone with your life?
  5. What have you always wanted? Did you ever get it?
  6. What is your favourite month of the year?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Hope you're enjoying this fricking fantastic Friday! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
Pretty good! Kind of holidays, I had the day off because yesterday there was a holiday. Long weekend :D
And you have a great weekend as well!

What was the last picture you took with your phone?
It was of a friend of mine, we were eating pizza on a playground :D

Do you sing whilst taking a shower/bath?
If I'm alone I do xD Well, it's actually just humming because I forgot the lyrics xD

If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
I would choose Australia, since I have relatives in Melbourne there. But I would miss skiing in the alps :( 

Do you trust anyone with your life?
No. I don't know why, but I don't really found anyone that would deserve that much trust.

What have you always wanted? Did you ever get it?
I have no idea. Maybe a girlfriend lol And yes I got it, sadly just for some months, then it was over...

What is your favourite month of the year?
I go with July. It's the warmest month and I get summer holidays :D

What was your first impression of me?
I think I met you as you were a senior. I looked up to you because you are a senior. I always wanted to be a senior. I was hyped to be a moderator and do stuff with you. I still look up to you. 

What's the best compliment you have received?
I don't know, never really cared about compliments, I rather cared about criticism. But I would say as I were in 5th grade that my parents complimented me on getting all As.

replies.body:
Opinions on me?
A true leader! At first I was kind of pissed about your replies on the forums about the staff team, but after we talked a bit about the community&staff meeting idea, I liked you. As you joined the staff team I was still a bit skeptic but after some time you opened my eyes. There were major flaws and you pointed them out, you never tried to sugarcoat it, just the straight facts. To be honest you are one of the reasons why I decided to search for flaws and speak up. I'm looking up to you and I'll continue to do so. Please be how you are!

What direction do you want the staff team to go?
It should go in a more chill direction. Right now there are policies for everything and one mistake means that you have to worry about a staff warn. When I was promoted to junior everyone had fun. We trolled each other and stuff. Now it's kind of frowned to do so. The gap between the senior staff and the mods is growing bigger, at least that's how I see it.

How is being Slack Owner?
It's not that different to being an admin, but you get some pretty nize perms :D It's still fun to be an admin.

There were major flaws and you pointed them out, you never tried to sugarcoat it, just the straight facts. To be honest you are one of the reasons why I decided to search for flaws and speak up. I'm looking up to you and I'll continue to do so. Please be how you are!

What direction do you want the staff team to go?
It should go in a more chill direction. Right now there are policies for everything and one mistake means that you have to worry about a staff warn. When I was promoted to junior everyone had fun. We trolled each other and stuff. Now it's kind of frowned to do so. The gap between the senior staff and the mods is growing bigger, at least that's how I see it.

How is being Slack Owner?
It's not that different to being an admin, but you get some pretty nize perms :D It's still fun to be an admin.

replies.body:
Opinions on me?
You are a great guy! By the way the last time you messaged me with some German words, I was sitting in class and suddenly the slack notification went of xD Good thing that I could say it was an iphone notification and that I use an android phone.. Well, you have good ideas, but you don't think about them to well. Sometimes you seem hectic and you try to push your opinion through, this doesn't mean that's a bad thing. In the end I still like you <3

replies.body:
Were you born in Germany?
Yes, I still live where I was born :D

If so, what's your opinion on the states?
The states in Germany or USA?
I'm going to assume you mean the states in Germany. Well, it's a good system, each state has it's own "government" but they still have to listen to the overall government. In terms of living, I love living in Hesse.

Also Congratz on your 2 year anniversary!

replies.body:
Opinions on me?
To be quite honest I hated you when I wasn't a staff member, I thought you were annoying, but I have to say your maps were good. Well, since you joined the staff team I got to know you better and I have to admit you are a pretty chill guy. It's nize to talk to you :D

Reactions when you first became a staff member?
I was hyped AF and still shaking because of the interview. I wasn't really confident that I did it, but in the end I passed the interview stage. I had to take a shower because of the sweating xD

replies.body:
Out of Avicus, who do you think is the most addicted player? (Who do you think plays the most on Avicus)
Wow, I have no idea. According to the games tab I would say _Vouch. 

Who is the most active forum user next to Blaze?
Straight out of my head, I choose you!

Do you believe that you can make it to Sr. Mod?
Nope, with the current system and seniors I'll always be a moderator. Maybe that's a good thing, it's more fun and you are closer to the community :D

Will you ever retire/when do you think you will retire as a moderator?
Of course I will retire at some point, don't want to wait for my demotion. I hope I still enjoy minecraft in the next year or until my 17th birthday. We'll see :D

Opinions?
You were always a friendly person, at least how I see it, but in the last time you were pretty annoying, especially the controversial forum topics. Well you got punished and therefor it isn't that important anymore. I loved to talk to you on TS, I should be able to come on again xD

Do you believe that you can make it to Sr. Mod?
Nope, with the current system and seniors I'll always be a moderator. Maybe that's a good thing, it's more fun and you are closer to the community :D

Will you ever retire/when do you think you will retire as a moderator?
Of course I will retire at some point, don't want to wait for my demotion. I hope I still enjoy minecraft in the next year or until my 17th birthday. We'll see :D

Opinions?
You were always a friendly person, at least how I see it, but in the last time you were pretty annoying, especially the controversial forum topics. Well you got punished and therefor it isn't that important anymore. I loved to talk to you on TS, I should be able to come on again xD

Wassup Flo! CONGRATS

replies.body:
Opinions :)
How can you be so positive and friendly? :3
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions :)
How can you be so positive and friendly? :3

replies.body:
Opinions :)
You are an OP defender! I still know that one scrim I subbed and was defending with you. One of the few scrims I really enjoyed :D In terms of person, you are friendly and helpful. I really like you! I have a question, what did happen with the offer to move to Germany? Did you decline or accept?

How can you be so positive and friendly? :3
I have no idea. Sometimes I have to stop myself before doing stupid things like calling an annoying person out. But in the end I imagine that it will make them only more annoying. I also try to use as few swear words as possible, at least when I type something.

replies.body:
Opinions on me? =P
You are my favourite red head swimmer girl with occasional glasses and cheesepuff addiction!
Jokes aside, you are a great guy, really funny and a good friend I guess, although I don't really understand why you are always crept out by me. You should know by now that I can be crazy xD As I said you are a great guy even without seeing your face or hearing your voice (both make me sad tho, but it could be worse :))

Favourite country?
Germany and closely followed by Australia.

Favourite colour?
Lime green, then purple and I know they are not colors, black and white :D

And Thanks! <3
